awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 8 nominations.

fullplot: While helicopters overhead spray against a Medfly infestation a group of Los Angeles lives intersect, some casually, some to more lasting effect. Whilst they go out to concerts and jazz clubs and even have their pools cleaned, they also lie, drink, and cheat. Death itself seems never to be far away, even on a fishing trip.
plot: The day-to-day lives of a number of suburban Los Angeles residents.
title: Short Cuts

tomatoes.consensus: Robert Altman's ensemble drama deftly integrates its disparate characters and episodes into a funny, poignant, emotionally satisfying whole.
